amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 and printed in the Congressional Record to specify that any person who manufactures or distributes a controlled substance shall be liable in a civil action to any party harmed, directly or indirectly, by the use of that controlled substance.

action.text: Mr. Barrett (WI) raised a point of order against the Latham amendment (A008). Mr. Barrett of Wisconsin stated that the amendment offered by Mr. Latham is not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
